title: Sending Mobile Signals to the OpenTelemetry Collector
author: David Rifkin
description: OpenTelemetry components that unite information about microsystems in a backend architecture can also link mobile telemetry to web services and databases.
cntitle: 发送移动信号到 OpenTelemetry Collector
cndescription: OpenTelemetry 组件能够将后端架构中微系统的信息统一起来，还可以将移动遥测数据与 Web 服务和数据库关联起来。
